Title: Episode 10
Plot: Mrs Mullins thinks that Daniel is the father when she finds out her daughter Emily is pregnant. Daniel's friends come to his defense against the accusations. Emily refuses to reveal who the father of her unborn child really is. Dorcas gives bonuses to the staff at the post office. When Dorcas sees Daniel giving money to Emily she begins to wonder if he is in fact the father of the baby.
